global.cookie_text: This website uses cookies to help us give you the best experience when you visit. By using this website you consent to our use of these cookies. Find out more about how we use cookies and how to manage them by reading our cookie notice
global.not_enough_data_to_show_profile: We don't have enough data from you to be able to show your profile.
global.click_on_link_to_fill_required_fields: Please click on the following link to fill the required fields.

reg-profile.fiscal_id: Fiscal ID or company registration number
reg-profile.name: Name
reg-profile.student_validator: If you don't specify a referee it will be automatically asigned
reg-profile.terms_of_use: I agree with the terms of use
reg-profile.architecture-and-or-urban-and-regional-p: Architecture and/or Urban and Regional Planning
reg-profile.Lang_level_C1: C1: Effective operational proficiency or advanced
reg-profile.profile_visibility_hidden: Hidden. Cannot be searched or viewed
reg-profile.notifications_enabled: Enabled. You'll receive emails once a day if a student wants to get in contact with you
reg-profile.notifications_disabled: Disabled. You won't receive any emails, except for announcements about the service
reg-profile.what_is_talent_for_you_in_a_few_words: Explain us what is talent for you in a few words
reg-profile.most_valuable_skills_for_company: A list of the most valuable skills for the company
reg-profile.setup_alternative_contact: Setup an alternative contact user that will receive all the notifications instead of the main account
reg-profile.want_to_view_all_details_of_student: Do you want to view all the details of this student?
reg-profile.set_by_both_parties: Chosen by both referee and student
reg-profile.set_by_referee_or_student: Set by either the referee or the student
reg-profile.want_to_show_this_company_how_talented_y: Do you want to show this company how talented you are?
reg-profile.we_are_looking_for_people_skilled_in: We're looking for people skilled in
reg-profile.fix_the_following_errors: You'll need to fix the following errors
reg-profile.click_on_button_to_fill_required_fields: Please click the following button to fill the required fields.
reg-profile.institution_fix_the_following_errors: You'll need to fix the following errors or your referees won't be able to validate profiles
reg-profile.profile_readiness_explanation: Getting your profile refereed gives a third party opinion of you and helps increasing the possibilities of contact from a company
reg-profile.get_a_better_refeer: Get a better refeer improving your profile readiness and improve possibility of company contact
reg-profile.request_is_managed_by: Your request is being managed by
reg-profile.cant_find_your_institution: Can't find your institution? ask your referee and institution to join Talented Europe
reg-profile.this_step_sends_an_email_to_your_referee: This step sends an email to your referee with instructions on how to join Talented Europe, automatically registers him as referee once his institution joins, and adds you to the refeeral queue
reg-profile.referee_said_about_you: This is what your referee said about you
reg-profile.not_enough_data_to_do_a_refeer: We don't have enough data from you to be able to do a refeer.
reg-profile.you_must_put_referee_email: Please note: You must put the referee email, not the one form the institution
reg-profile.do_you_want_to_leave_institution: Do you want to leave the institution? this will send the pending validation requests back to it, and you won't be able to validate anyone until another institution invites you back
reg-profile.tab_changes_not_saved: Tab changes haven't been saved, you may lose some data
reg-profile.cannot_send_more_alerts_to_this_company_: You cannot send more alerts to this company today
reg-profile.tell_the_company_that_you_be_interested: Tell the company that you may be interested to work for them
reg-profile.alert_sent_successfully: Alert sent successfully to the company
reg-profile.you_have_already_sent_an_alert_to_this_c: You have already sent an alert to this company
reg-profile.complete_the_registration: Complete the registration by adding the following information
reg-profile.warning_some_fields_has_errors: Warning: Some fields couldn't be saved because there were errors, check each field to see the issues
reg-profile.referee_is_part_of_institution: Referee is part of %s get in contact with him to ask a institution change if required
reg-profile.referee_isnt_part_of_any_institution: Referee isn't part of any institution. Please ask him to get invited by one
reg-profile.this_email_user_cannot_be_a_referee: This email address is registered to an user that cannot be a referee
reg-profile.if_request_hasnt_been_completed: If your request hasn't been completed in %s days you will be able to create a new request
reg-profile.you_havent_set_any_personal_skills: You haven't set any personal skills yet. If you request referee you cannot modify them.
reg-profile.to_see_more_details: To see more details you must be registered
reg-profile.account_activation_successful: Account activation was successful, you may log in now
reg-profile.account_has_not_been_verified: Account has not been verified. Please verify your email and activate your account
reg-profile.remove_account_confirm: Are you really sure that you wish delete your account? It's going to remove all your information
reg-profile.cant_send_alerts_until_you_fill_the_prof: To be able to send an "alert" to companies, you have to fill your profile. Please, review which information you should provide.
reg-profile.required_cert_warning: Please note: if you don't upload the certificate of authenticity the institution won't appear on the list of refereeing institutions
reg-profile.invalid_credentials: These credentials do not match our records
reg-profile.profile_not_available: This profile is not available now, please try later
reg-profile.terms_required: You must accept the terms of use
reg-profile.user_type_required: You must select a user type
reg-profile.cant_find_institution_set_mail: Can't find your institution, send them an invitation
reg-profile.institution_data_required: You must fill the name and email of the Institution
reg-profile.select_institution_required: You must select the Institution to which you belong

landing.meta_title: Talented Europe | Links young talent to employers across europe
landing.what_is_text_1: Can you imagine being able to hire the best students in whichever European country? Would you like to be part of the elite student sector in Europe? Thousands of companies will have direct access to your contact information, and the better marks you get the greater choices you will have to get a nice job.
landing.what_is_text_2: That is what Talented Europe offers. A showcase with a ranking of the best students in Europe. A simple idea which joins employers and students. The meeting point of excellence.
landing.subscribe_text: Get notified about all the events and news happening around Talented Europe
landing.subscribe_text_question:
Get Talented Europe news into your inbox.
Feel free to give us your answer for: What is talent for you?
landing.meta_description: An Erasmus Plus project which makes the business of matching top students to job and internship opportunities across Europe much easier
landing.talented_for_students: For students - Talented Europe will enhance your employability with the endorsement of your tutors and put you in touch with employers across Europe for internships or first career jobs.
landing.talented_for_employers: For employers - Talented Europe will link you with talented young students across Europe and help you find the right person who can contribute to your organisation’s success with the special talents and skills that you are looking for.
landing.what_is_text_1_txt: Can you imagine being able to hire the best students in whichever European country? Would you like to be part of the elite student sector in Europe? Thousands of companies will have direct access to your contact information, and the better marks you get the greater choices you will have to get a nice job.
landing.what_is_text_2_txt: That is what Talented Europe offers. A showcase with a ranking of the best students in Europe. A simple idea which joins employers and students. The meeting point of excellence.

email.accountActivated_line_2: Thank you for signing up on Talented Europe.
email.accountActivated_line_3: Please verify Your Email Address by clicking the link below.
email.accountActivated_line_5: Thank you for using our application
email.changeInstitution_subject_1: %s has invited you as referee on Talented Europe.
email.changeInstitution_line_2: %s has invited you as referee on Talented Europe.
email.changeInstitution_line_3: Since you're already a Talented Europe referee we need to you to confirm your change to this institution
email.changeInstitution_line_5: Thank you for using our application!
email.institutionRemoved.subject_1: %s has removed you from his Institution on Talented Europe
email.institutionRemoved.line_2: %s has removed you from his Institution on Talented Europe. Please get in contact with them if you were removed by error, so they can fix this situation
email.institutionRemoved.line_3: Thank you for using our application!
email.inviteCreated_subject_1: %s has invited you as referee on Talented Europe
email.inviteCreated_line_2: %s has invited you as referee on Talented Europe
email.inviteCreated_line_3: We need you to create your user clicking the following link.
email.inviteCreated_line_5: Thank you for using our application!
email.validatorRequested_subject_1: %s has asked you as referee his profile in Talented europe
email.validatorRequested_line_3: %s has invited you as referee on Talented Europe.
email.validatorRequested_line_4: We need you to resend this email to the institution you work for so they can register using the following link
email.validatorRequested_line_5: Please note that if they register using clicking the following button you will be invited automatically into their institution
email.validatorRequested_line_7: Thank you for using our application!
email.newAlerts_line_2: Hello we're reminding you that some students alerted you on our platform
email.newAlerts_line_3: Please click the following button to log in and see your panel
email.validationsPending_line_2: Hello we're reminding you that you have some referee's pending on our platform
email.validationsPending_line_3: Please click the following button to log in and see your panel
email.disclaimer: DISCLAIMER: This message is intended exclusively for its address and may contain information that is CONFIDENTIAL, and protected by professional privilege. If you are not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination, copy or disclosure of this communication is strictly prohibited by law. If this message has been received in error, please immediately notify us via e-mail at ( %s ) and delete it.
email.disclaimer_plain: DISCLAIMER: This message is intended exclusively for its address and may contain information that is CONFIDENTIAL, and protected by professional privilege. If you are not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination, copy or disclosure of this communication is strictly prohibited by law. If this message has been received in error, please immediately notify us via e-mail to %s and delete it.'
email.profile_not_filled_line_1: We've seen that you profile is not complete, so we wanted to remind you that unless you fill all the required information you won't be able to access all the features of our application.
email.reverseInviteCreated_line_2: We recently received a request from %s to join your institution
email.reverseInviteCreated_line_3: If you want to confirm this user, visit your profile and accept it on the pending invitations view
email.institution_account_created_line_2: A referee from your institution, preregistered you on Talented Europe, so they can refeer a student from your institution
email.institution_account_created_line_3: If you want to finish registration, please click the following button, otherwise ignore this email

validators.student_passed_validation_successfully: The student passed your validation successfully
validators.student_didnt_meet_criteria: The student didn't meet the criteria
validators.make_sure_you_have_reviewed_student: Please make sure you have reviewed the student profile carefully before validating it
validators.give_us_explanation_of_student_is_not_va: Please give us an explanation of the reason the student is not valid.
validators.note_if_validation_is_passed_as_no_stude: Note: If the validation is passed as "No student" the student will be able to validate his profile again.
validators.user_hasnt_complete_filling_its_profile: hasn't complete filling it's profile. Until this process is complete you cannot validate any student
validators.note_invites_are_only_valid_14_days: Note: invites are only valid 14 days after being sent, and they will disapear from this list afterwards
validators.invitation_is_not_valid_or_you_accepted_: Either your invitation is not valid anymore, or you already accepted it
validators.youll_receive_notifications_from: From now on you'll receive validation notifications from
validators.do_you_want_to_remove_referee: Do you want to remove %s from your institution?
validators.validation_was_removed: The validation was removed because you indicated that %s wasn't a student from this institution
validators.cannot_invite: Cannot invite, either this email is registered to another type of user or he already has an invitation pending from this institution
validators.cannot_find_invitation_to_delete: Cannot find invitation to delete, please try again later

register.you_will_receive_an_email: You will receive an email with instructions about how to confirm your account in a few minutes.
register.confirmation_email_may_take_few_minutes: Your confirmation email may take a few minutes to arrive, make sure you also check out your spam folder
register.registration_complete_successfully: Registration complete successfully you may log in now.

error-page.not_allowed_to_do_this_action: You're not allowed to do this action.
error-page.we_didnt_find_the_page: We didn't find the page you were looking for.
